name: Jouef/Hornby
description:
Jouef is the iconic French brand of model trains and road circuits. They have been creating model trains, wagons, 
locomotives and H0 scale cars for more than 70 years.
Founded in 1944 by Georges Huard, Jouef has become a leading brand in the field of model trains in France and, 
to this day, the brand is exclusively distributed by the Hornby group.
Hornby France has been awarded several times by the French magazine "Le Train" for its miniature Jouef models.
